section.title: Compatible Operating Systems
section.para:
RCE releases are provided for Windows and Linux. It is regularly tested on
Windows 10
Windows Server 2019
CentOS 8
Debian 11
Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
and should also run on Mint 10.04 and SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 15 SP2.

section.title: Support of 32 Bit Operating Systems
section.para: Starting with release 8.0.0, RCE is only shipped for 64 bit systems. If you still require 32 bit packages, you can continue to use previous RCE releases, but there will be no standard feature or bugfix updates for them.
